backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing admin‑controlled CRUD for pricing plans and user profile storage with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark design tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingPla: Admin panel UI for creating, editing, and deleting pricing plans using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/Header.t: Responsive header with navigation, Internet Identity auth controls, and conditional Admin button for admin users.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, animated reveals, and CTA buttons using siteCopy content.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollRe: IntersectionObserver-based wrapper that fades and slides children into view with optional delay.
frontend/src/components/landing/Sections: Landing sections for stats, features, and pricing, using ScrollReveal and optional backend pricing data.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Static text/content configuration for the landing page including hero, stats, features, pricing, and FAQ.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for admin checks, user profiles, and pricing plans using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes, applying global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the landing page layout and conditionally displays an admin panel based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, requirements, features, and architectural notes for building the Tripple Host site.
